content: pretty pretty flower scarf by gnathalie2 it s about 60 inches long i have tons of stitch dictionary books and for the life of me i could not get a couple of them right i have been wanting to make a flower scarf that is all one piece not a bunch of flowers sewn together so after a few failed attempts i ended up just winging it so here is how i made it materials size g hook ww yarn i used caron simply soft in pink pattern this scarf is made like a two way street first go up one end turn around and go back down chain 6 join with a slip_stitch 1 first 2 petals chain 3 2 double_crochet in next chain chain 3 slip_stitch in same space chain 3 2 double_crochet in next chain chain 3 slip_stitch in same space 2 chain 17 slip_stitch into 6th chain from hook repeat #1 repeat # 1 & 2 until the scarf is as long as you want it to be end with # 1 now for the way back down 3 repeat #1 now you have all four petals on the flower 4 chain 5 slip_stitch into 5th chain of chain-17 chain 6 slip_stitch into next flower repeat #1 now repeat 3 and 4 until you re back at the beginning end with #1 so pretty much the pattern is half a flower up one way then the other half going back down the slip_stitch that you do into the chain-17 is just so that you have a more put together looking scarf
